SELECT i.`id` AS issueId, i.`project_id` AS projectId, i.`name`, i.`content`, i.`issue_type` AS issueType, i.`issue_priority` AS issuePriority, i.`issue_status` AS issueStatus, i.`manager_user_id` AS managerUserId, i.`write_user_id` AS writeUserId, i.`is_important` AS isImportant, i.`start_dt` AS startDate, i.`end_dt` AS endDate, i.`updated`, i.`created`, b.`name` AS projectName, manager.`name` AS managerName, writer.`name` AS writerName FROM tb_issue i JOIN tb_project b ON i.project_id = b.id JOIN tb_user manager ON i.manager_user_id = manager.id JOIN tb_user writer ON b.user_id = writer.id
JOIN tb_project_member member ON (member.project_id = i.project_id AND member.user_id = #{userId} )
AND b.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{projectName}, '%')
ORDER BY i.`id` DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT i.`id` AS issueId, i.`project_id` AS projectId, i.`name`, i.`content`, i.`issue_type` AS issueType, i.`issue_priority` AS issuePriority, i.`issue_status` AS issueStatus, i.`manager_user_id` AS managerUserId, i.`write_user_id` AS writeUserId, i.`is_important` AS isImportant, i.`start_dt` AS startDate, i.`end_dt` AS endDate, i.`updated`, i.`created`, b.`name` AS projectName, manager.`name` AS managerName, writer.`name` AS writerName FROM tb_issue i, tb_project b, tb_user manager, tb_user writer WHERE i.project_id = b.id AND i.manager_user_id = manager.id AND b.user_id = writer.id AND i.`id` = #{issueId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `tb_issue` ( `id`, `project_id`, `name`, `content`, `issue_type`, `issue_priority`, `issue_status`, `manager_user_id`, `write_user_id`, `is_important`, `start_dt`, `end_dt`, `updated`, `created` ) VALUES ( NULL, #{projectId}, #{name}, #{content}, #{issueType}, #{priority}, DEFAULT, #{assigneeId}, #{userId}, DEFAULT, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, NOW(), NOW() )

SELECT i.`id` AS issueId, i.`project_id` AS projectId, i.`name`, i.`content`, i.`issue_type` AS issueType, i.`issue_priority` AS issuePriority, i.`issue_status` AS issueStatus, i.`manager_user_id` AS managerUserId, i.`write_user_id` AS writeUserId, i.`is_important` AS isImportant, i.`start_dt` AS startDate, i.`end_dt` AS endDate, i.`updated`, i.`created`, b.`name` AS projectName, manager.`name` AS managerName, writer.`name` AS writerName, CASE WHEN CURDATE() BETWEEN i.`start_dt` AND i.`end_dt` THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isToday FROM tb_issue i JOIN tb_project b ON i.project_id = b.id JOIN tb_user manager ON i.manager_user_id = manager.id JOIN tb_user writer ON b.user_id = writer.id
JOIN tb_project_member member ON (member.project_id = i.project_id AND member.user_id = #{userId} )
WHERE i.`issue_type` = '3'
ORDER BY i.`id` DESC
